history.proof: intros a b c H. hauto lq: on use: Rlt_le_trans, Rlt_irrefl, Rle_div_l, Rle_div_r, Rle_lt_trans, Rlt_le unfold: Rle.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "c > 0" with "a < b * c".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "/ (?M2287 * ?M2288) = / ?M2287 * / ?M2288" with "a < b * c".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "?M2287 = ?M2288 -> False" with "a < b * c".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "c > 0" with "a < b * c".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "?M2287 = ?M2288 -> False" with "a < b * c".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "a / c < b" with "a < b * c".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a / c < b Unable to unify "a / c < b" with "a < b * c".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of Rinv_mult_distr (/ (_ * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a < b * c Unable to unify "0 < ?M2297 * ?M2298" with "c * (a / c) < c * (b * c) \\/ c * (a / c) = c * (b * c)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet * is not finished.
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a < b * c Unable to unify "0 < / ?M2297" with "b * c < b".
In environment a, b, c : R H : c > 0 H0 : a < b * c Unable to unify "c > 0" with "b * c < b".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros a b c H. split. - intros. apply Rle_div_l. + apply H. + split. * apply Rinv_mult_distr. { apply Rgt_not_eq. apply H. } { apply Rgt_not_eq. apply H0. } * apply H0. - intros. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := b*c). + apply Rmult_le_reg_l with (r := c). * apply Rlt_gt. apply H. * rewrite Rinv_mult_distr. { apply Rmult_lt_0_compat. - apply Rinv_0_lt_compat. apply H. - apply Rabs_pos_lt. apply Rgt_not_eq. apply H0. } { apply Rgt_not_eq. apply H0. } + apply Rmult_lt_compat_r. * apply Rgt_not_eq. apply H0. * apply H0.
